title: What is the percentage growth of VMI's R&D as a % of Product Sales from FY2023 to FY2024? Format answer as a % with two decimal places.
description:
1. Use VMI's 10-K to find FY2023 and FY2024 inputs for R&D expenses, which are 55,000 thousand and 59,000 thousand, respectively.
 
 2. Use Valmont's 10-K to find FY2023 and FY2024 inputs for Product Sales, which are 3,772,835 thousand and 3,660,779 thousand, respectively.
 
 3. Using inputs from steps 1 and 2, calculate R&D as a % of Product Sales for each year: FY2023 = 55,000/3,772,835 = 1.4578% and FY2024 = 59,000/3,660,779 = 1.6117%.
 
 4. Calculate percentage growth of the ratio from FY2023 to FY2024: ((1.6117%-1.4578%) / 1.4578%) x 100 = 10.56%

rubric.criteria: Use R&D expense of 55,000 thousand for FY2023 as an input
Use R&D expense of 59,000 thousand for FY2024 as an input
Use Product Sales of 3,772,835 thousand for FY2023 as an input
Use Product Sales of 3,660,779 thousand for FY2024 as an input
Calculate FY2023 R&D as % of Product Sales using the formula: 55,000/3,772,835 = 1.4578%
Calculate FY2024 R&D as % of Product Sales using the formula: 59,000/3,660,779 = 1.6117%
Compute percentage growth of the ratio using the formula: ((1.6117% - 1.4578%) / 1.4578%) Ã— 100 = 10.56%
